translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

At this moment, one o’clock at night, Captain Fileno arrives and says that the enemy at dawn today will be in this place; it is therefore incumbent upon Your Lordship Your Lordship Your Lordship Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Secretariat of War Affairs Caçapava, March 21, 1840 Most Illustrious Sir Colonel João Antônio da Silveira. (a) Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic To citizen Colonel João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division. Wherever he may be found.

Attached to this document was the letter dated March 20, 1840 from Captain Fileno de Oliveira Santos to Maximiano Rodrigues Fernandes.
